dialogue.name: LORFEO
dialogue.text: I bet I could do that...

dialogue.name: LORFEO
dialogue.text: Wha─ How long were you standing there in silence!? Don't you know it's rude to...to... Wait, aren't you that mortal bonded to Feo Ul?

dialogue.name: LORFEO
dialogue.text: Well now, isn't this a pleasant surprise! I've a proposal I was meaning to put to you, as it happens. Interested?

dialogue.name: LORFEO
dialogue.text: So these skywatchers you see all over─they're good at what they do, but even they can't tell you if it's raining or whatever back on the Source, no?

dialogue.name: LORFEO
dialogue.text: But with my help, they could! Aye, aye! I could cross the rift, see what the weather's like for myself, come back, and share my knowledge with these mortals by whispering to them in their dreams!

dialogue.name: LORFEO
dialogue.text: I could do the same for the skywatchers on the other side, too! Everyone would have all the answers, and they wouldn't even know how they'd got them! Mwahahaha! Wouldn't that be grand?

dialogue.name: LORFEO
dialogue.text: Your silence is all the approval I need. Off I go! Hehehe!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Due to Lor Feo meddling with the dreams of skywatchers in the Source and the First, skywatchers may now provide forecasts for every region regardless of their location.
